name: Greenlight Newsletters
overview:
Greenlight provides stress-free email newsletters for business owners from beginning to send.

Most business owners hate doing their own email marketing, because it’s hard to get it say what you what, look how you want, and it always seems to take longer to hit the send button than expected, making for a stressed and frustrated person.

Sadly, this takes one of the most effective tools for marketing and promotions and makes it a hindrance because of the stress and aggravation associated with it.

So it’s a stress-free, start-to-finish email service. We help you figure out what to say, and then write it, draft it and turn it into a professionally designed email and then we handle all the steps to make sure it gets to people you want to see it. It’s literal three step process from beginning to send.

Monthly emails in their inbox keep your customers engaged and you stay top of mind.

2/3 of American adults read email daily. This is your chance to speak directly to them.

You will retain your customers longer and grow your business with their referrals.

external_links.title: Greenlight, Selected in The Big Idea Competition
